page.title: Staff - Micasita
page.description: Meet our dedicated team of professionals
page.heading: Our Team
page.intro: Our dedicated team of professionals is committed to serving our community with compassion, expertise, and cultural sensitivity.

member1.name: Señora Mayra
member1.description: Señora Mayra is currently the Montessori Teacher Supervisor and Curriculum Coordinator after heading the Jardin de las Flores classroom since Mi Casita opened up in 2001. She is a native of Mexico City.

member3.name: Señora Rebeca
member3.description: Señora Rebeca is the Montessori Head Teacher for El Pequeño Campo Children's House.

member4.name: Señora Claudia
member4.description: Señora Claudia is the Montessori Head Teacher for El Jardin de las Flores Children's House.

member5.name: Señora Blanca
member5.description: Señora Blanca is our Solarium Toddler Community Head Teacher.

member6.name: Señora Liz
member6.description: Señora Liz serves as the director and school business administrator.

member7.name: Señora Rosa
member7.description: Señora Rosa is our Outdoor and Physical Education Guide.  She also serves as our Program Support Specialist.
